channel.title: How-To Geek
channel.description: We explain technology. Learn more with our articles, reviews, tips, and the best answers to your most pressing tech questions.

item.title: Traveling Internationally? Roamless’s Easy-to-Use eSIM Is 20% Off
item.dc:creator: Kris Henges
item.description: If you're an international traveler, you'll want to pick up a Roamless eSIM.
item.content:encoded: With more carriers and phone manufacturers embracing eSIMs, it's time to consider what exactly they can do for you. One of the biggest advantages of an eSIM is that it allows you to easily use multiple SIMs with a single phone, making dual-simming incredibly easy.

item.title: 8 New Shows & Movies to Watch on Netflix, HBO Max, and More This Weekend
item.dc:creator: Keeley Brooks
item.description: Netflix, HBO Max, Hulu, Apple TV+, and Prime Video all have some great new shows and movies for your weekend!
item.content:encoded: As we slide right on in to October’s streaming season, its first weekend is on fire with multiple new releases. From the Josh Hartnett-led action flick Fight or Flight to the highly anticipated new season of Netflix hit anthology series Monster, these titles are guaranteed to be well worth your time. Besides, you know you’re curious. There’s even a Cillian Murphy movie in the mix.

item.title: 15 Special Characters You Need to Know for Bash
item.dc:creator: Dave McKay
item.description: That sequence of strange symbols on the Bash command line must mean something, right? We're breaking down special characters and how to use them.
item.content:encoded: If you want to master the Bash shell on Linux, macOS, or another UNIX-like system, special characters (like ~, *, |, and >) are critical. We'll help you unravel these cryptic Linux command sequences and become a hero of hieroglyphics.

item.title: YouTube TV NBC Channels Are Safe With New Long-Term Deal
item.dc:creator: Cory Gunther
item.description: Your channels are safe, for now.
item.content:encoded: Last week, YouTube TV and NBC Universal were both rather public about their ongoing negotiations, which led to a lot of coverage about YouTube TV losing access to countless important TV stations and channels. After a short-term deal was announced earlier this week, we finally have some better news.

item.title: How and Why I Made My Own iPhone Weather Widget
item.dc:creator: Adam Davidson
item.description: See local weather conditions instantly with a bespoke image.
item.content:encoded: I've never been truly satisfied by any weather widget that I've found for my iPhone. The native Weather app's widget is fine, and options such as CARROT Weather are funny, but neither lets me see what the weather is like in an instant, without having to interpret all the data and icons. That's why I decided to create my own using Shortcuts.

item.title: Best October Amazon Prime Deals of 2025
item.dc:creator: Kris Henges
item.description: You don't have to wait until the 7th to get these deals.
item.content:encoded: Amazon's Big Deal Days sales event offers deep discounts on plenty of products, from laptops to phones and more. We've rounded up the best deals so you don't need to search for them.

item.title: The Most Efficient Family-Friendly Hybrid SUVs You Can Buy in 2025
item.dc:creator: Tyler Dupont
item.description: These SUVs balance comfort, space, and hybrid efficiency, perfect for famillies.
item.content:encoded: Families looking for the perfect balance of space, comfort, and fuel efficiency are turning to hybrid SUVs more than ever in 2025. Rising fuel costs and the growing demand for eco-friendly options have made these vehicles the smart choice for drivers who don’t want to compromise on practicality.

item.title: The 11 Best Free Movie Websites (That Are Legal and Safe)
item.dc:creator: Derek Malcolm
Josh Bell
item.description: You don't need to pay a cent to watch tons of great movies online.
item.content:encoded: While there seems to be no end to the ever-increasing prices of all the major streaming services, it's no surprise that the menu of free, ad-supported streaming TV (FAST) movie sites and services continues to expand, too.

item.title: 3 Slick Linux Apps You Should Install This Weekend (October 3 - 5)
item.dc:creator: Jordan Gloor
item.description: We're heading to the cinema with Tux this weekend.
item.content:encoded: After you start using Linux for the first time, you may wonder what you should install to make use of it. There's a ton of software to choose from, but it's hard to sort through it all. Here are three I think are worth trying.

item.title: Everything We Know About The Mandalorian and Grogu Movie—So Far
item.dc:creator: Keeley Brooks
item.description: Join Din Djarin and Grogu on their next big adventure across the galaxy!
item.content:encoded: Do you hear that? That’s the sound of Star Wars fans everywhere simultaneously whispering, “This is the way,” in celebration of finally seeing The Mandalorian and Grogu film’s first official trailer, released September 22. It’s been quite a wait since the two were announced as the focus of Lucasfilm’s ever-evolving movie slate, and now that the trailer is here, fans are left with one burning question: What the heck is this movie about?
